settings.tw-products-recommendation-heading: px-6 py-20 md:p-20 font-medium text-mobile-heading-3 md:text-desktop-heading-3 lg:text-[38px] border-[1px] border-x-brand-black w-full text-center
settings.tw-product-card: flex flex-col md:flex-row md:flex-wrap justify-center items-center text-center
settings.tw-product-info: w-full absolute bottom-3 text-brand-black flex flex-col justify-center items-center gap-1
settings.tw-product-title: leading-[120%] tracking-[.03vw] font-medium text-[4.3vw] md:text-[2.1vw] lg:text-[1.19vw]
settings.tw-product-price: leading-[120%] tracking-[.03vw] font-medium text-[3.7vw] md:text-[1.8vw] lg:text-[.98vw] text-brand-gray

settings.tw-product-details: lg:aspect-square flex flex-col lg:justify-center gap-10 px-4 py-10 md:p-10 lg:w-1/2 border-x-[1px] border-b-[1px] border-black lg:border-l-0 lg:border-y-[1px]
settings.tw-combination-info: flex flex-col gap-2 md:flex-row-reverse md:justify-between md:items-center
settings.tw-product-item: flex-none bg-white transition-transform duration-200 ease-in-out hover:scale-105 cursor-pointer
settings.tw-price-option: flex items-center gap-3 text-mobile-body md:text-desktop-body lg:text-[1.12vw] cursor-pointer
settings.tw-price-input: absolute opacity-0 w-6 h-6 lg:w-[1.7vw] lg:h-[1.7vw] no-spin
settings.tw-product-actions: w-full bg-brand-black text-white uppercase px-6 py-4 font-medium text-mobile-button md:text-desktop-button lg:text-[1.12vw] text-center
